description: Validates handoff protocol compliance after agent tasks

hooks.prompt: Check if this subagent task required a handoff document. If the agent performed file modifications, code changes, or significant operations, verify a handoff file exists in {PROJECT_DIR}/.scratchpad/handoffs/ with pattern {agent-name}-*-{SUCCESS|FAIL}.md. If handoff is missing for a task that modified files, remind the orchestrating agent to ensure handoffs are created. Return 'approve' if handoff exists or task was read-only, otherwise provide guidance on handoff protocol.
